definitions: A emphatic refusal to allow someone entrance or to comply with a request
A defiant 'no' used to indicate that something will absolutely not happen
examples: Can I come in? Not by the hairs on my chinny chin chin!
He asked to borrow my car, but I said, 'Not by the hairs on my chinny chin chin!'
lemma: not by the hair of one's chinny chin chin
source: not by the hairs on my chinny chin chin
